artist: Designer: Lori Weitzner; Producer: Jack Lenor Larsen, Inc.
description: Cotton pile in horizontal crimping that forms approx. 2" dark & lt. Squares glued to cotton backing. Beige Bisque
dimension: overall (Hemmed on all four edges.): 24 x 24 in. (60.96 x 60.96 cm)
image_copyright: © Jack Lenor Larsen%2C Inc.%2C Lori Weitzner
text:
Weitzner's desire to develop a design concept that took advantage of the unique texture and surface characteristics of velvet, led to the development of this distinctive texture. The challenge of maintaining stability and loft of the pleating system needed for upholstery fabric was solved by mechanical means: first pleating and then adhering the system to a backing cloth of suitably density and flexibility.   

Jacob's Ladder, available in eight color ways, was a very successful fabric for Larsen and the company continued to produce it for many years.
title: Jacob's Ladder
